title: Build UI for onboarding flow
description: Develop the user interface for the onboarding flow to guide new users through setup and initial app usage.

title: Build UI for search
description: Design and implement the search interface to help users easily find relevant content or features.

title: Build settings UI
description: Create the user interface for settings, enabling users to customize their preferences and configurations.

title: QA and test all major user journeys
description: Conduct quality assurance and testing on all primary user flows to ensure seamless user experience and functionality.

title: Design settings and search pages
description: Conceptualize and design the layout and functionality of the settings and search pages for user-friendly navigation.

title: Add account management endpoints
description: Implement endpoints to manage account-related functionalities, such as user information, preferences, and settings.

title: Design onboarding flow
description: Develop a streamlined onboarding flow design to guide new users through initial setup and app introduction.

title: Add search endpoints
description: Create API endpoints to support search functionality, allowing users to retrieve and filter relevant information.

title: Add authentication endpoints
description: Establish authentication endpoints to manage user login, registration, and secure access to the application.

title: Research pricing points of various competitors and trial different business models
description: Conduct competitive analysis on pricing strategies and experiment with various business models to identify optimal pricing.

title: Conduct 5 wireframe tests
description: Perform tests on five different wireframes to gather feedback and evaluate design efficacy.

title: Create wireframe prototype
description: Develop a wireframe prototype to visualize the layout and functionality of the user interface for testing purposes.

title: Review results of usability tests and iterate
description: Analyze feedback from usability tests and make iterative improvements to enhance user experience.

title: Create paper prototype and conduct 10 usability tests with potential customers
description: Develop a paper prototype and perform ten usability tests to gain insights into user preferences and pain points.

title: Market discovery
description: Conduct market discovery research to understand target audiences, needs, and trends in the industry.

title: Competitor Analysis
description: Perform competitor analysis to assess their strengths, weaknesses, and market positioning.

title: Research the market
description: Conduct thorough market research to gather insights into trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape.
